content: I'm getting the error Server process for file:///home/chris/Desktop/mathlib4/Mathlib/RingTheory/AlgebraicIndependent.lean crashed, likely due to a stack overflow or a bug. whenever I try to start Lean. It seems to only happen on mathlib files with a lot of dependencies. Is anyone else having this issue or know a solution?
I fixed it for now by merging master into that branch and waiting for the new cache.
